title: In the forbidden land
creator: Landor, Arnold Henry Savage
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Landor, Arnold Henry Savage: In the forbidden land  an account of a journey in Tibet, capture by the Tibetan authorities, imprisonment, torture, and ultimate release ; also various official documents, including the enquiry and report by J. Larkin, appointed by the government of India, with a map and two hundred and fifty illustrations ; in two volumes. London  Berlin
